alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 09 at 2:33PM PST until December 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 PM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
